column2: UPDATE 1-Japan's Konica Minolta plans to buy U.S. cancer test firm -Nikkei TOKYO
column3: July 2 Japanese office equipment maker Konica Minolta Inc plans to acquire U.S. healthcare firm Ambry Genetics Corp to diversify its business
